mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.state AS "state", a.num AS "num", a.full AS "full", a.reduction AS "reduction", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_coupon( id, name, begin_date, end_date, state, num, full, reduction, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{state}, #{num}, #{full}, #{reduction}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_coupon SET name = #{name}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, state = #{state}, num = #{num}, full = #{full}, reduction = #{reduction}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
